title: Security: .gitignore Sane Defaults
description: Adds a conservative .gitignore for common build outputs and secrets.

with.text:
# build outputs
bin/
obj/
dist/
build/

# logs
*.log

# env/secrets
.env
*.key
*.pem

# node
node_modules/

# python
__pycache__/
.venv/

# rust
/target/

# java
/target/
